page.title: 04Happy Mount Park.
page.content: Happy Mount Park was opened in 1927 and consists of footpaths,grassy areas, trees,roses and an ornamental garden. There is one area as a playground including slides, play boot, swings, climbing frame,a see-saw and a miniature train.There are three different golf courses in the form of putting,crazy and miniature.Other sports facilities include three tennis courts,a bowling green,trampolines and table tennis.In the centre of the park there is a cafe and craft shop which has a display of glass blowing.Near the ornamental garden there is a paddling pool .50% of the visitors during the day are aged 65+.The next popular group are children under 16's.Nearly all people are visitors to the area.The park is used as the central part of the Morecambe Illuminations from August to October.
